member.name: T:ProteinFileReader.DelimitedFileReader.eDelimitedFileFormatCode
member.summary: Columns present in the delimited text file

member.name: P:ProteinFileReader.DelimitedFileReader.HeaderLine
member.summary: Protein Name or Protein Name and Description
member.remarks: If file format is eDelimitedFileFormatCode.SequenceOnly, returns the protein sequence

member.name: P:ProteinFileReader.DelimitedFileReader.SkipFirstLine
member.summary: Controls whether to skip the first line

member.name: M:ProteinFileReader.DelimitedFileReader.ReadNextProteinEntry
member.summary: Reads the next entry in delimited protein (or delimited peptide) file
member.returns: True if an entry is found, otherwise false
member.remarks: This function will update variable mFileLineSkipCount if any lines are skipped due to having an invalid format

member.name: M:ProteinFileReader.DelimitedFileReader.OpenFile(System.String)
member.returns: True if success, false if a problem

member.name: P:ProteinFileReader.FastaFileReader.HeaderLine
member.summary: Header line (protein name and description), without the start character (<)

member.name: P:ProteinFileReader.FastaFileReader.ProteinLineStartChar
member.summary: Character that precedes each header line (the line with the protein name and description)

member.name: P:ProteinFileReader.FastaFileReader.ProteinLineAccessionEndChar
member.summary: The character that follows the protein name; always a space

member.name: M:ProteinFileReader.FastaFileReader.GetHeaderLine(System.Boolean)
member.param: If true then include the start character (<)

member.summary: Reads the next entry in a Fasta file
member.returns: True if an entry is found, otherwise false

member.name: T:ProteinFileReader.ProteinFileReaderBaseClass.udtProteinEntryType
member.summary: This structure is used both for Proteins and for Peptides Only Peptides from delimited text files use the Mass and NET fields

member.name: P:ProteinFileReader.ProteinFileReaderBaseClass.EntryUniqueID
member.remarks: Only used for delimited text files of peptides, with a eDelimitedFileFormatCode format that has a UniqueID column

member.summary: Number of lines skipped due to having an invalid format
